mapper.update: UPDATE sys_admin SET ADMIN_PASSWORD= #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ADMIN_ID= #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT sp.ADMIN_ID AS "id",sp.ADMIN_STAFF_NO AS "staffno", (SELECT ROLE_NAME FROM sys_role WHERE ROLE_ID = sp.ADMIN_ROLE_ID) AS "rolename", sp.ADMIN_USERNAME AS "username", sp.ADMIN_REALNAME AS "realname", sp.ADMIN_STATUS AS "status", sp.ADMIN_PHONE AS "phone", sp.ADMIN_EMAIL AS "email", sp.ADMIN_CREATETIME AS "createtime", (SELECT ADMIN_REALNAME from sys_admin sf WHERE sf.ADMIN_ID=sp.ADMIN_CREATEUSER) AS "createuser" FROM sys_admin sp WHERE sp.ADMIN_ID= #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
